content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors related to insufficient ingredients in furnaces
- Ensure that all furnaces have the necessary ingredients and fuel to operate. Regularly check the status of each furnace and replenish supplies as needed.

### Errors when attempting to craft items without required resources
- Verify that you have the necessary resources in your inventory before attempting to craft items. Use the inventory check feature to confirm resource availability.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing structures or items that may block placement.
